document_data.mainbody: '''Bitumen''' was an unusual substance related to [[petroleum]] found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Description: Bitumen was an oily, black, flammable solid or semi-liquid that floated on water.
document_data.Availability:
Bitumen could be bought from [[Aurora's Emporium]] through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'', where it was sold for 1 [[gp]] per {{SI|12|oz}}. It was intended for use in laboratories and by [[wizard]]s.

Bitumen could be found in natural oil pools and [[tar pit]]s, mined from the ground, or distilled from petroleum and [[coal]].{{Cite dragon/81/Living in a material world|61,64}}{{Cite dragon/152/In a Cavern, In a Canyon...|19,23}} These rock oil and tar deposits were most common in the [[Shining Lands]] of [[Veldorn]], [[Var]], and [[Ulgarth]], in [[Chult]], and around the [[Lake of Steam]]. Huge pools of oil could also be found in the [[Underdark]], especially under the [[Eastern Shaar]].
document_data.Usages:
* Bitumen was used as a sealant by carpenters, shipwrights, and coopers, and was used in alchemical recipes.
* ''[[Spider climb]]'' and ''[[improved spider climb]]'' used a drop of bitumen and a live [[spider]], both eaten by the caster.
